title: Pulling latest-devel in Docker compose results in "Unable to Find Datasource" (Datasource vs. Bucket?)
body:
I cloned and ran the docker-compose file located [here](https://github.com/regel/loudml/tree/master/docker/compose).

It pulled the following images...

| Container         | Version      | Image ID     |
|-------------------|--------------|--------------|
| influxdb          | 1.7.8        | c0c0eb7f0bc1 |
| loudml/loudml     | latest-devel | b80613b0c560 |
| loudml/chronograf | 1.6.1        | 0d4d1430c386 | 

When I go to LoudML-Chronograf, I get an **Unable to Find Datasource** error.

![Screen1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3123188/66429713-a0bcfa00-e9e6-11e9-94f6-afdd1040e61d.png)

![Screen2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/3123188/66429721-a4e91780-e9e6-11e9-8921-b491e26d25ac.png)


The LoudML logs record that the LoudML API does not contain a **datasources** endpoint (Returns **404** - not found).

```bash
$ docker logs -f loudml_loudml_1
INFO:root:starting Loud ML server on 0.0.0.0:8077
INFO:schedule:Running job Every 1 minute do daemon_clear_jobs() (last run: [never], next run: 2019-10-08 18:49:06)
INFO:schedule:Running job Every 1 minute do daemon_clear_jobs() (last run: 2019-10-08 18:49:06, next run: 2019-10-08 18:50:06)
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:50:12] "GET /datasources HTTP/1.1" 404 139 0.000859
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:50:12] "GET /datasources HTTP/1.1" 404 139 0.000481
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:50:27] "GET /datasources HTTP/1.1" 404 139 0.000705
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:50:27] "GET /datasources HTTP/1.1" 404 139 0.000638
INFO:schedule:Running job Every 1 minute do daemon_clear_jobs() (last run: 2019-10-08 18:50:06, next run: 2019-10-08 18:51:06)
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:51:56] "GET /models HTTP/1.1" 200 110 0.001031
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:51:58] "GET / HTTP/1.1" 200 231 0.001631
172.23.0.6 - - [2019-10-08 18:51:58] "GET /datasources HTTP/1.1" 404 139 0.000484
INFO:schedule:Running job Every 1 minute do daemon_clear_jobs() (last run: 2019-10-08 18:51:06, next run: 2019-10-08 18:52:06)
```
If I CURL the **datasources** API, I receive an **unknown endpoint** error.

```bash
$ curl -XGET 0.0.0.0:8077/datasources
unknown endpoint
```

If I CURL the **buckets** API, I receive a response.

```bash
$ curl -XGET 0.0.0.0:8077/buckets | jq
[
  {
    "addr": "influxdb:8086",
    "database": "telegraf",
    "measurement": "loudml",
    "name": "influx",
    "type": "influxdb"
  },
  {
    "addr": "kapacitor:9092",
    "database": "from_loudml",
    "measurement": "loudml",
    "name": "kapacitor",
    "type": "influxdb"
  }
]
```

I believe by pulling **loudml/loudml:devel-latest** I pull the **master** version which replaces the **datasources** API with **buckets** API.

Is this what causes the **unknown endpoint** error in the Chronograf UI?
